actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill for the relief of Shannon Chiles and Joseph Chiles.

summary.text: Authorizes an employee of the Internal Revenue Service who is stationed in a specified district to transfer, with the approval of the director of such district, accumulated annual and sick leave to either of two named Internal Revenue Service employees stationed in such district.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Shannon Chiles and Joseph Chiles.
